definitions: The action of gripping something tightly between two surfaces, typically the thumb and a finger.
The act of causing a sharp, uncomfortable sensation.
The act of stealing something, especially something of small value.
The act of restricting or economizing, especially on money.
examples: The pinching of the new shoes made her feet sore.
He was pinching pennies to save for a new car.
The dog was pinching food from the table.
The cold was pinching at her exposed skin.
